job description:
We are seeking a data scientist to build the next generation of advertising tools for video game creators. In this role, you will use Amazons massive data sets to drive installs of games for our clients across desktop, mobile and console games. As a member of a new team inside Amazon Game Services you will play an instrumental part in setting the vision for the product and bringing a new service to market. You will also have access to and collaborate with fellow scientists across all of Amazon as you join and influence our broader scientific community.

Expertise in the application of AI and machine learning to build audiences, recommendations, and optimization models is essential to your success. As the first scientist on the team, you will be expected to design and implement experiments, influence the roadmap, and partner with other teams to deliver results.

In this role you will.

· Apply your expertise in AI and ML to build game recommendations and user acquisition audience segments
· Plan and conduct end-to-end analyses from data requirement gathering to data processing and modeling
· Work with engineering and external teams to find and gather new sources of gamer data
· Partner with cross-functional teams to identify new opportunities requiring the use of modern analytical and modeling techniques
